## Task 3

  a. The qualitative variables are RIVER and SPECIES.
  b. The quantitative variables are MILE, LENGTH, WEIGHT, and DDT.
  
```{r}
sp <- ddt$SPECIES
tab <- table(sp)
barplot(tab,col = 1:3)
```
 
  c. There are three species in the ddt data set.
  d.
  
```{r}

head(bigfish)
```
